msgSnippet: My guess would be that a property file needed by J2EEUnit is not in the classpath. -- Erik Meade             emeade@objectmentor.com Senior Consultant

My guess would be that a property file needed by J2EEUnit is not in
the classpath.

--
Erik Meade             emeade@...
Senior Consultant      Object Mentor, Inc.
http://www.junit.org

> From: selena su [mailto:selena.su@...]

>      Is there anyone has came across this error before ? When i tried to
> run the TestSampleServlet.class which will test the SampleServlet ! (i'm

> Thanks,
> selena
